query: SELECT bf.eventoId, t.codigo as turmaCodigo, t.numeroTurma, t.cursos, t.instituicoes, t.anos, t.periodos, COUNT(DISTINCT bf.formandoId) as qtd_formandos, COUNT(DISTINCT bf.grupoId) as qtd_grupos FROM briefing_formando bf INNER JOIN formandos f ON bf.formandoId = f.id INNER JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id GROUP BY bf.eventoId, t.codigo, t.numeroTurma, t.cursos, t.instituicoes, t.anos, t.periodos ORDER BY t.codigo;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT bf.eventoId, t.codigo as turmaCodigo, t.numeroTurma, t.cursos, t.instituicoes, t.anos, t.periodos, COUNT(DISTINCT bf.formandoId) as qtd_formandos, COUNT(DISTINCT bf.grupoId) as qtd_grupos FROM briefing_formando bf INNER JOIN formandos f ON bf.formandoId = f.id INNER JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id GROUP BY bf.eventoId, t.codigo, t.numeroTurma, t.cursos, t.instituicoes, t.anos, t.periodos ORDER BY t.codigo;
